name: Yajiuma Pennant Race
overview: Based on the latest professional baseball data in 1989, he joined the team of a complete simulation of professional baseball! and enter the game. Of course, there are also difficulties. Leading the team to the pennant, aiming for the Japan Series, and M.V.P. During the game, you will be not only a player but also a manager. Participated as a playing manager, such as player substitution touch-up signs. “Yajiuma Pennant Race” is a new type of baseball game in which MV.Ps are both number one and professional. The game has 2 modes. An open mode where you can enjoy a pennant race game in which matches are played according to a schedule. If you do a pennant race, you play against the computer.
